response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value to you, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $12,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a product worth $15,000 at a substantial discount. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 12000}
